ygData.subject: Re: rusty weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to do about 45 to max out on your skill... HOWEVER this is what I did, and I also put in two skill points a level towards smithing... just my personal
ygData.messageBody:
You need to do about 45 to max out on your skill... HOWEVER this is what I
did, and I also put in two skill points a level towards smithing... just my
personal experience...
